posts.post_content:
This will actually make lifegain decks deadly... against non-lifegain decks.  
  
If you can flip this thing over without dying, your oppoment deserves the pummeling of constant 5 damage a turn.  
  
its basically a 4 turn timer for them to whittle down your already massive life totals, or deal with the problem.  
  
and if you have more than one of the field... Good game.

posts.post_content: I played two of these in my white weenie deck for FNM. I had both on the table and got them transformed. My opponent spent all his time and mana detaining my chalices. If I had two more in this deck I could have wiped him out. I did have my 17/3 Elite Inquisitor that he also had to deal with. This ended up going on for over an hour on round one. I ended up loosing to his detain ability. This card had I had two more in my deck would have won the game for me.
posts.html:
